overview: Sexy, horny, and don’t they know it! No detail is spared in The Housewives Club, just pure, unadulterated stories of extramarital affairs, and boy you’d be crazy to miss it! After a long time away, we reunite with the spectacular Sienna Day, as well as the busty redheaded firecracker, Jasmine James. And we also introduce you to the fiery Lola Rose, a Private new girl who joins fellow www.private.com debutant, Hazel Moore, for a stunning interracial that rounds out our blockbuster in style! Private Blockbuster, The House Wives Club, don’t miss it!
title: The Housewives Club
